name: Cafe Alpha
description:
Welcome to Cafe Alpha! Come sit in a semi-accurate portrayal of the cafe and listen to some tunes. Play your own too!

This is a fan project by Philip Fertsman. The project is incomplete and not currently being worked on.

Music from Gabriel Pulcinelli - https://ponpoko.bandcamp.com/

 

I started working on this project in the summer of 2022 after finishing Yokohama Kaidashi Kikou (YKK) and becoming obsessed with sitting in the cafe myself. So I started picking away at this little digital space.
I mostly code when making games, so this was quite a challenge because most of it was modelling. Once the summer ended, I realized just how monumental this project was for a single dev with rudimentary modeling/texturing skills so I put it down. Maybe I'll return to it one day, maybe I won't be able to. I'm glad I made it, I'm glad I got to learn more about YKK's world.

To play your own music enter the $game_location%/Cafe Alpha_Data/StreamingAssets/ folder and read the .txt in there!

If anyone wishes to continue working on the game, I'd gladly hand over my assets, research and unity project.

"The night of humanity, may it be a peaceful age."
